nodes.text: Life Day Matriarch was a painting made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It was part of a series of three paintings, alongside Life Day Kashyyyk and Life Day Patriarch, that were made for the festivities of Life Day. The painting in question depicted a female Wookiee howling to the winds. It was supplied during the events of an annual Life Day celebration on Kashyyyk.

Life Day Matriarch, alongside Life Day Patriarch and Life Day Kashyyyk, were supplied randomly to players who chose a painting instead of a Life Day orb, although they could skip both altogether if they only asked for a robe and were also Wookiees. As of 2005, it is no longer available, and thus is considered a collector's item.
